Process.Title: SUINPUT
Process.Brief: SU input data file

Parameter.Name: input
Parameter.Brief: Input file path

Process.Title: SUOUTPUT
Process.Brief: SU output data file

Parameter.Name: output
Parameter.Brief: Output file

Parameter.Name: append
Parameter.Brief: Append data to the end of the file

Process.Title: SEGYREAD
Process.Brief: Read an SEG-Y tape

Parameter.Name: tape
Parameter.Brief: tape - Input tape device or seg-y filename.

Parameter.Name: buff
Parameter.Brief: buff - =1 for buffered device (9-track reel tape drive); =0 possibly useful for 8mm EXABYTE drives

Parameter.Name: verbose
Parameter.Brief: verbose - =0 Silent operation; = 1 echo every 'vblock' traces

Parameter.Name: vblock
Parameter.Brief: vblock - Echo every 'vblock' traces under verbose option.

Parameter.Name: hfile
Parameter.Brief: hfile - File to store ebcdic block (as ascii).

Parameter.Name: bfile
Parameter.Brief: bfile - File to store binary block.

Parameter.Name: over
Parameter.Brief: over - quit if bhed format not equal 1, 2, 3, 5, or 8; = 1 override and attempt conversion

Parameter.Name: format
Parameter.Brief: format - If over=1 try to convert assuming format value.

Parameter.Name: conv
Parameter.Brief: conv - convert data to native format = 0 ; assume data is in native format

Parameter.Name: ns
Parameter.Brief: ns - Number of samples (use if bhed ns wrong).

Parameter.Name: trcwt
Parameter.Brief: trcwt - apply trace weighting factor (bytes 169-170) =0, do not apply. (Default is 0 for formats 1 and 5)

Parameter.Name: trmin
Parameter.Brief: trmin - First trace to read.

Parameter.Name: trmax
Parameter.Brief: trmax - Last trace to read.

Parameter.Name: endian
Parameter.Brief: endian - Set =0 for little-endian machines(PC's,DEC,etc.).

Parameter.Name: errmax
Parameter.Brief: errmax - Allowable number of consecutive tape IO errors.

Parameter.Name: remap
Parameter.Brief: remap - Remap key(s).

Parameter.Name: byte
Parameter.Brief: byte - Formats to use for header remapping.

Process.Title: SEGYWRITE
Process.Brief: Write an SEG-Y tape.

Parameter.Name: tape
Parameter.Brief: tape - Tape device to use (see sudoc segyread).

Parameter.Name: verbose
Parameter.Brief: verbose - Silent operation. = 1 echo every 'vblock' traces

Parameter.Name: vblock
Parameter.Brief: vblock - Echo every 'vblock' traces under verbose option.

Parameter.Name: buff
Parameter.Brief: buff - =1 for buffered device (9-track reel tape drive); =0 possibly useful for 8mm EXABYTE drive.

Parameter.Name: conv
Parameter.Brief: conv - =0 don't convert to IBM format.

Parameter.Name: hfile
Parameter.Brief: hfile - ebcdic card image header file.

Parameter.Name: bfile
Parameter.Brief: bfile - Binary header file.

Parameter.Name: trmin
Parameter.Brief: trmin - First trace to write.

Parameter.Name: trmax
Parameter.Brief: trmax - Last trace to write.

Parameter.Name: endian
Parameter.Brief: endian - =0 for little-endian machines (PC's, DEC,etc...).

Parameter.Name: errmax
Parameter.Brief: errmax - Allowable number of consecutive tape IO errors.

Parameter.Name: format
Parameter.Brief: format - Override value of format in binary header file.

Process.Title: SUXWIGB
Process.Brief: X-windows Bit-mapped WIGgle plot of a segy data set

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Brief: if set, the values of x2 are set from header field specified by keyword

Parameter.Name: n2
Parameter.Brief: number of traces in the data set (ntr is an alias for n2)

Parameter.Name: d1
Parameter.Brief: sampling interval in the fast dimension: =.004 for seismic and =1.0 for nonseismic (if not set)

Parameter.Name: d2
Parameter.Brief: sampling interval in the slow dimension: =1.0 (if not set)

Parameter.Name: f1
Parameter.Brief: first sample in the fast dimension

Parameter.Name: f2
Parameter.Brief: first sample in the slow dimension: =1.0 for seismic and =d2 for nonseismic (if not set)

Parameter.Name: style
Parameter.Brief: normal (axis 1 horizontal, axis 2 vertical) or vsp (same as normal with axis 2 reversed)

Parameter.Name: tmpdir
Parameter.Brief: if non-empty, use the value as a directory path prefix for storing temporary files ...

Parameter.Name: x2
Parameter.Brief: array of sampled values in 2nd dimension: x2=f2,f2+d2,...

Parameter.Name: mpicks
Parameter.Brief: file to save mouse picks in

Parameter.Name: bias
Parameter.Brief: bias - data value corresponding to location along axis 2

Parameter.Name: perc
Parameter.Brief: perc- percentile for determining clip

Parameter.Name: clip
Parameter.Brief: clip - (perc percentile) data values less than bias+clip and greater than bias-clip are clipped

Parameter.Name: xcur
Parameter.Brief: xcur - wiggle excursion in traces corresponding to clip

Parameter.Name: wt
Parameter.Brief: wt=1 for wiggle-trace or wt=0 for no wiggle-trace

Parameter.Name: va
Parameter.Brief: va=0 for no variable-area; va=1 variable-area fill; va=2 for variable area, solid/grey fill

Parameter.Name: verbose
Parameter.Brief: Yes for info printed on stderr.

Parameter.Name: xbox
Parameter.Brief: xbox - x in pixels of upper left corner of window

Parameter.Name: ybox
Parameter.Brief: ybox - y in pixels of upper left corner of window

Parameter.Name: wbox
Parameter.Brief: wbox - width in pixels of window

Parameter.Name: hbox
Parameter.Brief: hbox - height in pixels of window

Parameter.Name: x1beg
Parameter.Brief: x1beg - value at which axis 1 begins

Parameter.Name: x1end
Parameter.Brief: x1end - value at which axis 1 ends

Parameter.Name: d1num
Parameter.Brief: d1num - numbered tic interval on axis 1 (0.0 for automatic)

Parameter.Name: f1num
Parameter.Brief: f1num - first numbered tic on axis 1 (used if d1num not 0.0)

Parameter.Name: n1tic
Parameter.Brief: n1tic - number of tics per numbered tic on axis 1

Parameter.Name: grid1
Parameter.Brief: grid1 - grid lines on axis 1 - none, dot, dash, or solid
